Suggested Usage: 8%-10% | Diacetyl Free

**10/02/2017**

Single Flavor Test: **5% & 7%**

60/40 | 0 Nic | 40W | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton

 

‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 hour Steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢**Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste *Both**

-- Aroma Intensity - Very Light | Faint Bread or Yest & Sweet Note
-- Sweetness - Dominant
_______________________________________________________________
**10/16/017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**


5% = Milder Taste & Aroma |**Continue to 7% SF Test**

 


‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel  -  **7%**

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:**
 Light Aroma Intensity | Very light Fresh Baked "Waffle" Dough 

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** 
Heavy Sweetness | Creamy | Faint Taste Baked Dough or "Waffle"


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Med. Flavor Intensity | Med. Yeasty (Dom) Baked / Toasted Dough | Tart with Touch of Sweetness | Med. "Toast" = Drying

----   Med. Body | Dry Coated Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ **Off Notes:** Slight Tart / Alkaline Taste (exhale)

---- Toasted Dominant | Softness Submissive
__________________________________________________
**10/23/2017 (3  Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Overall Unchanged

Light Aroma Intensity | Very light Baked "Waffle" Dough  | *Faint note of the "Banana" Aroma from Cornbread (OOO)?

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** 
Very Sweet | Smooth & Light Creaminess | Light Taste of 'Room Temperature Baked Dough Flavor but more "Present"

‚Ä¢**Vape:** 
Flavor Intensity -  Med. | Thick, Yeasty (Dom) Baked Dough with a Hint of & Tartness = "Toasted" or Baked Note | Faint Sweetness

--- ‚Üë in Body = Full | ‚Üë in Mouth Feel = Thick & Coated, Drying but Smooth

 

‚ñ∫ **Notes**

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None | Plain Lightly Sweetened Belgian Waffle 

‚Ä¢ A Hint of Tartness & No Noticeable "Butter" Notes

‚Ä¢ Bakeries, Desserts, Fruits, Nuts, Creams *Waffle Toppings*
__________________________________________________
Estimate

‚ñ∫ Usage:   5.5 % min  | 6 - 7 % med   | 8% max
    
Mix: 6.5 - 7.5%
